com.pokerface.pokerapi.game

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameController

  • @Controller
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameController serves vital function as the communication hub of the Front End users and the Back End server. It exists to receive incoming messages and using the classes and methods of GameService, UserService and AIService handle those requests and communication the appropriate message or object. It uses a combination of REST and STOMP end points for communication, REST for user initiated communication and STOMP for unprompted communications.

public GameStateTransport getGameInfo(@PathVariable(value="id")

        This method getsGameInfo of a specific game and responds with the info the user needs to display it
